text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَقُولُواْ رَٰعِنَا وَقُولُواْ ٱنظُرۡنَا وَٱسۡمَعُواْۗ وَلِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

translation.en: O you who have believed, say not [to Allah 's Messenger], "Ra'ina" but say, "Unthurna" and listen. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment
translation.id: (Wahai orang-orang yang beriman! Janganlah kamu katakan, Rā'inā,43) tetapi katakanlah, "Unẓurnā," dan "dengarkanlah. Dan orang-orang kafir akan mendapat azab yang pedih
